content:
From: Marco David <marco.david@ens.psl.eu>
Dear list,

Earlier this semester, we have started a new student formalization
project with Isabelle at the École Normale Supérieure (ENS) de Paris,
which has generated quite some interest among the current cohorts of «
normalien.ne.s ».

To fuel the students' curiosity and provide deeper technical insights
into the software, we would love to have an Isabelle expert join one
group meeting for an invited talk/lecture at ENS. If you happen to be
working in the Paris area, or even just visiting, and think you could
give an interesting talk to current beginners in Isabelle, please don't
hesitate to reach out! The date and any specific arrangements are fully
flexible.

We are looking forward to hear back from you.

With kind regards,
Marco
